== MattiasEriksson ==

My name is Mattias Eriksson and goes by the nick snaggen on irc (where I hangout on gimpnet or freenode Ubuntu related channels)

My interest in Linux is to help create a user friendly desktop based operative system. I have been contributing to various Gnome related projects, synce to improve the pocketpc situation for Linux, nvtv and totem to improve tv-output.
